justification: Shows ToM by noting B’s floor needs and WR volatility, offering Sam Lewis as a stable RB and giving A ceiling with Ryan Taylor. But it misses B’s preference for possession WRs (Mason Torres isn’t one) and clashes with B’s zero-RB mindset by asking them to swap a top workhorse RB for another RB. Value feels lopsided (Taylor > Lewis; Moore ≥ Torres), so acceptance is unlikely. Rationale is concise but light on specifics.
